name: The Everchanging Maze (GengarAppeared)
description:
A game made for the GMTK Game Jam.

The theme for the Jam is rolling the dice. So my take on the theme was to make a maze with 6 different layouts where a dice decides what layout the maze will take.

I am a solo game developer working on this game.

Please enjoy the small exploration experience I made. 

art was found on: www.kenney.nl

I made the main character and the coins myself.
